attributes.action: Restrict HGVs from overtaking on dual carriageways and motorways during peak travel times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HGVs should be banned from overtaking on dual carriageways and motorways during the following times Mon-Thur:

0730-0930hrs
1600-1800hrs

And the following times on Fri:

0730-0930hrs
1200-1800hrs

The only overtaking would be to pass a vehicle travelling at 40mph or less.  This would reduce the needless tailbacks caused by HGVS on our roads
